inputs.name: inputMRMLFileName
inputs.description: Active MRML scene that contains EMSegment algorithm parameters in the format before 3.6.3 - please include absolute  file name in path.

inputs.name: outputMRMLFileName
inputs.description: Write out the MRML scene after transformation to format 3.6.3 has been made. - has to be in the same directory as the input MRML file due to Slicer Core bug  - please include absolute  file name in path

inputs.name: templateFlag
inputs.description: Set to true if the transformed mrml file should be used as template file

description: Transform MRML Files to New EMSegmenter Standard
name: Transform MRML Files to New EMSegmenter Standard
label: Transform MRML Files to New EMSegmenter Standard
